title: CineQuest
description: A movie booking website featuring an admin panel for site management and a user panel for booking and browsing movies.

title: Leaf Disease Prediction
description: Designed and implemented a deep learning model to predict leaf diseases, improving prediction accuracy by 20%.

title: UGA Dining Platform
description: An online platform for UGA's dining services, streamlining the ordering process for students.

title: MelodyMatch
description: A song recognition system that identifies songs based on a user humming or singing. Utilizes advanced audio processing and pattern matching algorithms.

title: Breast Cancer Detection
description: Developed a Naive Bayes-based ML model for breast cancer prediction and built a Flask web app for real-time diagnosis.

title: Sentiment Analysis
description: Implemented a sentiment analysis system to classify textual data into positive, negative, or neutral categories using natural language processing techniques.

title: Speech Emotion Recognition
description: Developed a system to classify emotions from speech using audio signal processing and deep learning techniques.
